page.title: 19BUS SERVICE NEWTON ST CYRES.
page.content:
The bus service by Devon General between{Exeter and Crediton and return {is an hourly service. Double deckers {are used}.The first bus from Exeter leaves at 7.20a.m. and arrives at the Crown and Sceptre at 7.40a.m. and shortly afterwards at Woodley Lane.It takes about 5 minutes from there to Crediton.
The Barnstaple/Exeter railway line runs briefly through this block but the passenger station is just inside the neighbouring block at Newton. { Trains are infrequent}but will stop by request.The service is little used by local people.{The Beer Engine-a {local pub- has recently arranged with {British Rail special excursions to {Newton St. Cyres!
